aboutmeinfo: I’m a frontend developer from the Kempten area in the Allgäu, passionate about the endless possibilities of IT. I create user-friendly and visually appealing websites and applications optimized for smooth performance.
aboutmeinfo1: My focus is on developing user-friendly websites and technically high-quality projects. Every task gives me the opportunity to pursue creative approaches and deliver tailored solutions.
aboutmeinfo2: Programming, for me, is like hiking in the mountains: with a clear goal in mind, the path can be challenging, but the result is priceless. I view difficulties as motivation to keep growing.
skillsinfo: I have gained experience in building projects with various frontend technologies and concepts.
portolioinfo: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
joininfo: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
sharkieinfo: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help sharkie to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer whale.
contactinfo1: Contact me through this form. I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas, and contributing to your projects with my work.
contactinfo2: Need a Frontend developer? Contact me!
policyerror: You must accept the privacy policy
policy2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined
successmessage: Thank you, your message has been sent :)
